title.rendered: Splendid 3BHK Apartment For Sale/Rent In Som Vihar

content.rendered:
This 1600sqft Apartment Is Located in Som Vihar Which Is Among the most peaceful & well-connected localities in #SouthDelhi. This recently renovated apartment comprises of 3 spacious bedrooms, and a drawing dining room and offers community living in a secured complex. It Can also be rented out to MNC employees & Diplomats at ₹75k Per Month.
There’s One More Similar Option Available In RK Puram.

♕1600sqft
♕3BHK
♕For Sale/Rent
♕₹4CR/₹75K
♕Spacious Drawing Dining
♕Recently Renovated Apartment
♕Gated Condominium
♕Community Living
♕Secured Complex
♕In Close Proximity To Airport

Lalit Kaushik

Call On 98183-12077 For Site Visit

http://wa.me/919818312077

Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings Here
ROYALE REALTORS INDIA

Royale Realtors India – Luxury Real Estate

19 DDA Market, Shanti Niketan, New Delhi, Delhi 110021
